scripts.ci:validate: pnpm nx format:check --all && pnpm nx run web:lint && pnpm nx run web:security-validate && pnpm nx run web:content-validate && pnpm nx run web:docs-integrity-validate && pnpm nx run web:governance-validate && pnpm nx run web:i18n-validate && pnpm nx run web:pgf-validate && pnpm nx run web:intelligence-validate && pnpm nx run web:briefing-contracts-validate && pnpm nx run web:authority-signals-validate && pnpm nx run web:experience-intelligence-validate && pnpm nx run web:frameworks-validate && pnpm nx run web:aec-validate && pnpm nx run web:orchestration-validate && pnpm nx run web:content-os-validate && pnpm nx run web:home-validate && pnpm nx run web:sitemap-validate && pnpm nx run web:image-sitemap-validate && pnpm nx run web:media-manifest-validate && pnpm nx run web:media-derivatives-validate && pnpm nx run web:media-authority-validate && pnpm nx run web:visual-contract-validate && pnpm nx run web:seo-validate && pnpm nx run web:tokens-validate && pnpm nx run web:token-drift-validate && pnpm nx run web:authority-program-validate && pnpm nx run web:authority-constitution-validate && pnpm nx run web:test
scripts.ci:all: pnpm run ci:validate && pnpm run ci:build && pnpm run ci:a11y && pnpm run ci:visual
scripts.ci:verify: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm nx run web:verify --verbose
